title: Thicker Than Waters
description: The beloved ’80s sitcom about Patrick Waters D.D.S. and his family that’s always getting into something.
quote: If it wasn’t for candy, you’d be out of business.
altHero: a family portrait of the Waters: mom, dad, young son, and teen daughter
alt1: Patrick Waters the dentist is sprayed with water by his son
alt2: Mrs. Waters shrugs and eats cookies while she works out
alt3: Patrick offers a fistful of lollipops to his daughter
alt4: Patrick talks to his son in the kitchen
